items.name: Hotel Pacific
items.description: Luxurious hotel in the heart of Dehradun with modern amenities and panoramic city views.

items.name: Lemon Tree Hotel
items.description: Vibrant ambiance and a rooftop pool with proximity to major attractions.

items.name: Doon University
items.description: A public university known for its multidisciplinary programs and serene campus.

items.name: Graphic Era University
items.description: A prestigious private university offering engineering, management, and other courses.

items.name: Robber's Cave
items.description: A natural cave formation with a flowing stream, popular for trekking and picnics.

items.name: Sahastradhara
items.description: A serene waterfall known for its therapeutic sulfur springs, surrounded by lush greenery.

items.name: Orchard Restaurant
items.description: A popular restaurant serving delicious Tibetan and Chinese cuisine with a scenic view.

items.name: Kalsang Restaurant
items.description: Known for its authentic Tibetan, Thai, and Chinese food, it's a must-visit for food lovers.
